_description: Crop and land cover classification hierarchy across all map datasets. L0=Land surface type, L1=Crop category, L2=Crop type, L3=Seasonal variant. Generated by analyse_classes.py.

Grassland.description: Permanent and temporary grass, pastures, meadows

Bare.description: Bare soil, rock, sand, barren land

Fallow.description: Arable land temporarily not in production

Legumes.note: Some legumes (clover, lucerne) are perennial but grown as annual crops

Root Crops.note: Biennial plants (beet, carrot) grown as annuals

Fodder Crops.note: Includes both annual fodder (ryegrass) and perennial (grass leys)

Clover.note: Short-lived perennial (2-3 years), often grown as annual ley

Sugar Beet.note: Biennial plant grown as annual for sugar

Carrot.note: Biennial plant grown as annual for root harvest

Strawberry.note: Short-lived perennial (2-3 years), often replanted annually

33.name: Orchard, Vineyard or Other Perennial Crop

note.name: Raster classification - classes vary by season/product
